metadata.title: CVE-2018-11489 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The DGifDecompressLine function in dgif_lib.c in GIFLIB (possibly version3.0.x), as later shipped in cgif.c in sam2p 0.49.4, has a heap-based bufferoverflow because a certain CrntCode array index is not checked. This willlead to a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: giflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
